name: flauta
description: A rails-like server-side router for centralized route declaration. Includes path helpers and a printer script to inform you what routes are set and their properties.
author: BJ Neilsen

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:bin
scripts.build:lib: echo 'Compiling lib...' && rm -rf lib/**/*.js && mkdir -p lib && NODE_ENV=production babel --copy-files src --out-dir lib --ignore bin/flauta.js
scripts.build:bin: echo 'Compiling bin...' && NODE_ENV=production babel src/bin/flauta.js > bin/flauta.js
scripts.test: npm run test:unit:cov && npm run test:doctests && npm run test:flow && npm run test:lint
